name: A Lifetime of Looking for You (Cutscene)
name_original: A Lifetime of Looking for You (Cutscene)
description:
Experience the extraordinary journey of a young man in search of his childhood love.

A 3 minutes cutscene realized by Rafa'L (aka r66r) and Luky as an entry for the Let's Make a Scene: Sounds of Harmony Contest.

Credits (more details in-game)

Game Engine

Made with RPG Maker MZ, (c) Gotcha Gotcha Games Inc./YOJI OJIMA.

Graphics

Music & SFX
